column1: '''Middle-earth: The Wizards Companion''' is a source-book for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game
column2: MECCG]]. It contains the same rulings as the little rulebook provided in [[METW]] decks, only this time in large format and with extended examples and clarifications. ''The Wizards Companion'' also has some scenarios (theme play) for 1 to 5 players, and features color insert maps with lists of playable factions, allies, etc.

column1: The perfect reference and resource for players new to ''METW''. In this Companion you'll get the starter deck rules (in larger print!), the complete list of all the Limited Ed. cards, basic strategy tips, a selection of scenarios for playing out specific storylines in Middle-earth, plus solitaire rules. Also included is an 8 page full color NW Middle-earth map insert.
